message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust if you think that's unfair.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Given the inflation, it's a good deal for both of us if we settle now.
Let's compromise. I'll take 55% and you take 45%.  Given the inflation, it's a better deal for you than the last round. Let's not let this go on any longer.
